title: Shah Tepe (Afghanistan)
description: Shah Tepe (Afghanistan) or Nayibabad is located in Samanghan Province northwest of Tashkurghan. This is an area of tepes that range in date from the Epi-paleolithic (seventh millennium B.C.) to the sixteenth century A.D.

properties.description: Coordinates following Afghanistan Significant sites no. 181. Shah Tepe
properties.title: Afghanistan Significant sites location of Shah Tepe
